body_html:
Thanks, this solved it. Your code was not running, but the idea was clear, so I could fix it.

Now, if I have requests which use different batch sizes, I would have to reinit the network, right? I tried with resetting the graph, but then I again got a leak...

body:
Thanks, this solved it. Your code was not running, but the idea was clear, so I could fix it.

Now, if I have requests which use different batch sizes, I would have to reinit the network, right? I tried with resetting the graph, but then I again got a leak...
